index.name: backbone
index.subtitle: Backbone
index.about: Backbone.js gives structure to web applications by providing models with key-value binding and custom events, collections with a rich API of enumerable functions, views with declarative event handling, and connects it all to your existing API over a RESTful JSON interface.
index.description: Read the best free ebooks about Backbone framework.

books.title: Developing Backbone.js Applications
books.description: The goal of this book is to create an authoritative and centralized repository of information that can help those developing real-world apps with Backbone.
books.author: Addy Osmani

books.title: Backbone Tutorials
books.description: This book aims to get developers up to speed with single page web application development using Backbone.js as a foundation.
books.author: Thomas Davis
